title.narrative: Production of Plastic Cards in Ghana

description.narrative:
The overall development goal of the project is to improve income oppportunities for and the livelihood of the local population by creating employment opportunities and strengthening business development. In this way the project is contributing to poverty reduction and in general improving living standards.
The immediate objective of the project is to enable ICPS to extend their production to include advanced chip and plastic cards that can be certified by the ruling standards for mobile and payment/credit cards, including for Euro/Visa/Mastercard (EMV).
The project supports the specific strategic targets; - to facilitate local business development through capacity building of manufacturing companies in recipient countries - creating synergy with other business instruments.
The project includes establishment of production equipment as well as training.
